nodes.text: A mining camp was one of many similar mining camps run by the Mensix Mining Company on the planet Mustafar.
It consisted of several typical Mustafarian buildings, built to withstand the moon's hostile volcanic environment. The camp was protected by an energy barrier to repel wild creatures.

In 1 ABY, the miners of the camp were attacked by a huge and furios tulrus named Foehorn. Many of the miners couldn't escape the creatures fierce attacks and were immediately killed or mortally wounded. When Chief Ulon Glost learned of this attack, he immediately notified the expert hunter that he had hired to kill the creature. When the hunter arrived at the camp, there was nothing he could do for the dying miners. But the creature was still in the vicinity of the camp and the hunter attacked the tulrus. After a fierce fight, the creature was slain.

This camp was one of several of such camps on the planet Mustafar in Trials of Obi-Wan, the third expansion for Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to the games closure on December 15, 2011. During the quest The Man-eater that starts with Chief Ulon Glost, the player had to travel to this camp to kill the tulrus Foehorn. When the spacer arrived there, several Mustafarian NPCs were found lying on the ground, dying.
